name: Thunder League
description:
Thunder League is an 8-player party game inspired by "Achtung die Kurve", featuring literally unstoppable Vikings!

  • Drink Thunder Mead to gain speed
  • Crash into anyone slower than yourself for satisfying one-hit kills
  • Avoid collision with walls, giants and faster opponents
  • Jump right into the action as there are only four buttons to learn
  • Play together as a group of 8 friends in local multiplayer or against AI

Thunder League can also be downloaded from:

  • Game Jolt
  • IndieDB

Known issues:

  1. The game crashes frequently when using Avast. This problem appears to be a general issue for Unity games.
Thunder League was originally designed to be a full game to be released on Steam (and this was supposed to be a demo), but development on Thunder League has now stopped and Hellion Studios has been shut down. This demo is now effectively the full version of TL.
  • Full Dev post here: http://hellionstudios.com/the-end-of-hellion-studios/
